author: yoavs
msg: - Changed PRIORITY to LEVEL for consistency with log4j 1.2.x
- Factored out printing of page header and level selector

author: yoavs
msg: - Added comment regarding when to initiailize logger
- Added clearing of map in destroy() method

author: sdeboy
msg: * Can't reconstruct the event's timestamp if patternlayout's timestamp was used to store the data - ISO8601DateFormat can't convert the string back to a date.
However, both fields are supported in the receiver, so users can add properties to the SQL statement if they want events routed to unique tabs in Chainsaw V2).
